abstract: The new R&D; tax incentive represents a significant change in the policy mindset of the Federal Government as it relates to BERD and innovation policy in Australia. Contrary to its stated position in recent policy reviews, it appears that theres no cure in sight as the government intends to pare back its role in supporting innovation in the future.
title: Tax Hangover or Cure? Reforms for Research and Development Tax Incentives
subject: law
